attributes.action: To allow our English flag to be displayed through out England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
 We have in our country, other flags that have been put up e.g. American, Asian and other countries.
 I have no objection to other countries having their flags in England however not being allowed to show our own flag in our own country is not fair towards British citizens. 
 So all I’m asking is for you to allow us to be allowed to host our own flag in our country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of the petitions listed below:  

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/OurTraditions
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EngPatriot/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
